mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY bgroup desc,bstep asc) rnum, a.* from board a ) where rnum between 1 and 10
select * from board where bno = ( select pre_bno from ( select bno,lead(bno,1,-1) over(order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) as pre_bno from board ) b where bno=#{bno} )
select * from board where bno = ( select pre_bno from ( select bno,lag(bno,1,-1) over(order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) as pre_bno from board ) b where bno=#{bno} )
